name: Shopping Mall Tycoon
description:
"Want to run your own store to get rich? Now, take your chance!

Try to be the owner of all the shopping mall here, find the first bucket of gold and you can finally become the world-famous business tycoon!

Buy a small plot of land, build your first store, manage and try to expand it. As long as you hold enough money, new shopping malls and more customers will be served!

Attention! Make every effort to increase store capacity, promote customer spending capability and improve the service quality is what you should always keep in mind!

In this game, you will operate the most prosperous shopping mall. Use your smart brain to improve the traffic and attract various types of customers, and then, provide a high-quality services for all the customers.

In this way, you can not only make a combination of different shops but also find your own path to get rich. Remember, quality products and affordable prices is the key to increase the number of repeat customers!

If you like this kind of idle casual simulation games, then, come and challenge our idle shopping street."
1. Buy a piece of land and start to build your first shopping mall.
2. Upgrade and expand the store.
4. Unlock more kinds of shops and customers.
5. Expand the shopping mall to a more affluent area to get more profit.
